# usa-button

## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                                       | Type                                                                                                      | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `big`     | `big`     | The big button variant. ? Currently, the only size option available.              | `boolean`                                                                                                 | `undefined` |
| `text`    | `text`    | The button text.                                                                  | `string`                                                                                                  | `undefined` |
| `type`    | `type`    | The button type. ? Might not work. Using prop named `type` will return undefined. | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`                                                                         | `undefined` |
| `variant` | `variant` | The color variant of the button.                                                  | `"accent-cool" \| "accent-warm" \| "base" \| "outline" \| "outline-inverse" \| "secondary" \| "unstyled"` | `undefined` |
